description: Rocky Real Estate is offering this spacious apartment in Royal Cappadocia, Jumeirah Village Circle.  * Built up area : 841.41 Sqft * Central Air conditioning * Built in wardrobes * View: Pool View * Swimming pool * Gym * Open Kitchen * Ensuite Room * 1 Allotted parking * Pets allowed Reference Number: RO-R-21-2904 Cappadocia is a 5-storey residential building in Jumeirah Village Circle, a family-friendly community developed by Nakheel. The neighbourhood is divided into six sub-communities or districts (Districts 10 – 16) and features multiple residential developments amidst landscaped gardens. Cappadocia is developed by Beney Investments Limited in District 13. The freehold property was launched in 2007 and completed in 2013. Having four floors and 67 ready units, Cappadocia, JVC stands 65.6 feet tall.  Residents can choose from a mix of studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses, duplexes and loft apartments. The building has underground parking along with a 24-hour maintenance and security system. One can also find an outdoor swimming pool, a kid’s play area, a fully equipped gymnasium and multiple landscaped gardens in Cappadocia.  JVC Cappadocia is situated between Kahraba South East and Bijada Boulevard South. Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road can also be found in proximity. Residents have easy access to multiple parks, restaurants and tourist attractions such as Halfa Park, Lokmat Baladna and Dubai International Stadium. description: Type A 4 bed large, single row villa - A lovely large 4 bedroom in the brand new, gated development of Murooj.  Murooj is in the heart of Al Furjan by the master developer Nakheel.  This villa is bright, light and spacious with a downstairs ensuite bedroom, a separate Livingroom, a large dinning and entertainment area, open planned kitchen, guest bathroom, laundry and maids room. The large glass staircase leads to a big open plan family area with pantry.  The master bedroom has walk in wardrobes and a large private bathroom with double sink, bath and separate shower.  The additional 2 bedrooms also have build in wardrobes and private bathrooms. All bedrooms have beautiful light wooden flooring throughout.  There are 2 covered balconies offering fantastic views across the community and city.   At the front of the villa there is covered parking for 3 cars, a secure walled and gated garden for maximum privacy and path that leads to the back garden.  This is  a single row with large garden not overlooked by any other villas; a perfect family home This newly handed over community has multiple pools, parks and play areas, including dog parks and running tracks. Call for more information today.  ------- Development Details ------- Al Furjan is a residential property development near Jebel Ali in the United Arab Emirates. Nakheel is the master developer of this project. The Al Furjan development will comprise four specific villages: North, South, East and West, that will share the same streetscape designs, a network of pathways and access to amenities. Each village will have its own distinct characteristics that compliment the other and create a balanced variety of experiences.

description: Apartment features ▪︎ Apartment : 2BHK  ▪︎Master Bedroom ▪︎Built in wardrobes  ▪︎02 Washrooms  ▪︎Closed kitchen  ▪︎Spacious Hall ▪︎Balcony  ▪︎ Laundry Space  ▪︎ Storage Space  ▪︎ Public Gardens  Public Transportation in The Gardens, Dubai Dubai Metro is the most popular mode of transport in the area.  The Gardens Metro Station on Route 2020 is located on the Garden Boulevard that connects to the neighbouring community, Discovery Gardens. It has the capacity to accommodate approximately 125,000 riders daily, featuring two platforms, 20 taxi slots, four bus lay-bys, and two dedicated parking slots for individuals with disabilities. It is composed of ten districts that are homogeneously arranged in a radial pattern. These districts are numbered from 10 to 19. District 14 lies in the southwestern region of JVC between Lazuward and Bijada Boulevard. It is also close to the Al Khail Road (E44) and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) intersection. District 14 features a combination of established and under-construction housing projects. Complemented by modern amenities, these residential units are distributed between villas, townhouses and apartment buildings. In a prime location, close to Meydan Racecourse, the home of The Dubai World Cup and a variety of sports and leisure facilities, Riviera offers a desirable address and is within close proximity to Downtown Dubai and Dubai International Airport. Inspired by the French Riviera, the iconic mixed-use community will be home to residential apartments, retail outlets and a variety of onsite amenities.    Riviera comprises of various mid-rise residential buildings with a variety of retail outlets at ground floor level.  Each individual building will benefit from a swimming pool, landscaped gardens and a gym.   Key attractions will include a beautiful crystal lagoon and beach spanning 2km, a beautiful palm tree lined boulevard and numerous community parks.  Residential properties include studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments offering a variety of different views ranging from orientation towards Downtown Dubai and Burj Khalifa to community pool and canal views.   Riviera will also feature a wide variety of cafes and restaurants, convenience stores and shops.     When fully completed, Riviera will be home to over 20,000 residents including professionals and families. Phase I, II and III are currently under construction. description: This 3 bedroom plus maids townhouse is situated in a prime location within the community, offering residents easy access to the beach, as well as nearby retail and dining options The property's exterior is characterized by contemporary architecture, with a sleek and sophisticated design that blends seamlessly with the surrounding coastal landscape.  The townhouse boasts a private garden, providing a serene outdoor space for relaxation, entertaining, and enjoying the beautiful coastal climate.  Upon entering the townhouse, residents and guests are greeted by a spacious and inviting open floor plan, designed to maximize natural light and create a seamless flow between the living, dining, and kitchen areas.  The living and dining areas are thoughtfully designed to create a comfortable and elegant atmosphere, with large windows that offer views of the garden and fill the space with natural light.  The interior design of the townhouse reflects a contemporary aesthetic, with clean lines, neutral color palettes, and high-quality materials that contribute to a sense of modern luxury.  In addition to its interior spaces, the townhouse's outdoor areas are a standout feature, offering a private garden that serves as an extension of the living space.  Sur La Mer's waterfront location provides residents with unparalleled access to the beach and a range of outdoor activities, from water sports to leisurely strolls along the shore. Millennium Binghatti Residences comprises a mix of studios, one- and two-bedroom apartments. description: Welcome to your future home at Binghatti Mirage, nestled in the vibrant community of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC).  Size: 655.09 Sq. Ft.  Bedrooms: 1 Bathrooms: 2 Distance to Dubai Downtown: Only 20 minutes away!    Step into a bright and airy living space, perfect for relaxation or entertaining guests. The open floor plan seamlessly integrates the living, dining, and kitchen areas, creating a fluid space for relaxation and entertainment.   The kitchen is a culinary enthusiast's dream, featuring sleek cabinetry, premium appliances, and ample countertop space for meal preparation. Whether you're whipping up a quick breakfast or hosting a dinner party, this kitchen is equipped to meet your every need.   Retreat to the cozy bedroom, designed for ultimate comfort and tranquility.   Indulge in the elegant bathroom featuring contemporary fixtures and finishes.   Enjoy breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape from your private balcony.   Immerse yourself in the dynamic atmosphere of the retail boulevard, offering a diverse array of shops, cafes, and restaurants right at your doorstep.   Beyond the interiors, Binghatti Mirage offers an array of amenities designed to enhance your lifestyle. Residents can enjoy access to a state-of-the-art gymnasium, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and dedicated parking spaces. Additionally, the building's prime location in JVC provides easy access to nearby shops, restaurants, parks, and recreational facilities, offering a perfect balance of convenience and leisure.     Situated just 20 minutes away from Dubai Downtown, enjoy easy access to major attractions, business hubs, and entertainment destinations.   Join a vibrant and diverse community, where every day brings new opportunities for leisure, recreation, and socializing.   Experience the epitome of luxury living with premium finishes, thoughtful design, and world-class amenities.   Whether you're looking for your dream home or a lucrative investment opportunity, Binghatti Mirage offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and value.    With a combined experience of over 10 years, Ethos Real Estate stands as a beacon of trust and reliability in the Dubai real estate landscape. Our journey began with a singular vision – to redefine the standards of service and integrity in the industry.  Driven by a passion for excellence, our team specializes in a spectrum of real estate services, including residential leasing, commercial leasing, off-plan projects, residential sales, and commercial sales. Each member brings a unique set of skills and insights, contributing to our collective expertise and success.

description: This beautifully designed 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment located in the sought-after Fairways East Tower offers the perfect blend of comfort and style. With expansive windows that flood the space with natural light, the home provides an open and airy feel throughout. The modern kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, sleek cabinetry, and ample counter space for both cooking and entertaining.  The master suite features a generous walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with contemporary finishes. The second bedroom is spacious, offering versatility for guests or as an office space. Enjoy breathtaking city views from your private balcony, perfect for unwinding after a long day.  Building amenities include secure access, a fully equipped fitness center, and on-site parking. Located in a prime area, you are just minutes away from dining, shopping, and entertainment options, making this an ideal location for those seeking both convenience and luxury.  Don't miss the opportunity to make this stunning apartment your new home!
